here okay meet the guys at the heart of

their latest bubble just burst and now
they have a new idea for a market
trading carbon pollution they're about

means reducing our emissions by 80%
maybe even more by 2050
80% now the problem is that most of our

that's the cap I think that part is

governments would distribute a certain

there would be fewer and fewer permits

Innovative companies will get on board

polluters will get the vast majority of

more they've been polluting the more

for creating this problem in the first
place in Europe they try to cap and

carbon emissions actually went up the

just not

Devil Number Two is called
offsetting offset permits are created
when a company supposedly removes or

which can be sold to a polluter who

theory one activity offsets the
other the danger with offsets is it's
very hard to guarantee that real carbon
is being removed to create the permit
yet these permits are worth real money
this creates a very dangerous incentive

if we just drive a little less change
